trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per l'evento <see cref="E:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> event is raised when an <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> to a row is completed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> evento viene generato quando un <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> a una riga è stata completata.

trans-unit.source: When using <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, there are two events that occur for each data row updated.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>, sono disponibili due eventi che si verificano per ogni riga di dati aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: The order of execution is as follows:
trans-unit.target: L'ordine di esecuzione è come segue:

trans-unit.source: The values in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow> are moved to the parameter values.
trans-unit.target: I valori di <xref:System.Data.DataRow> vengono spostati i valori dei parametri.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato l'evento <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdating%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The command executes.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il comando.

trans-unit.source: If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, the first returned result is placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se il comando è impostato su `FirstReturnedRecord`, il primo risultato restituito è inserito nel <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

trans-unit.source: If there are output parameters, they are placed in the <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.
trans-unit.target: Se sono presenti parametri di output, questi vengono collocati nel <xref:System.Data.DataRow>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato l'evento <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.OnRowUpdated%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata del metodo <xref:System.Data.DataRow.AcceptChanges%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use both the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> events.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare entrambe le <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> e <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> event returns this output:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdating> evento restituisce il seguente output:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> event returns this output:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter.RowUpdated> evento restituisce il seguente output:

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> sent through an <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Data.DataRow" /> inviata attraverso un metodo <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> executed when <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.IDbCommand" /> eseguito quando viene chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Data.StatementType" /> values that specifies the type of query executed.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.StatementType" /> che specifica il tipo di query eseguita.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> sent through an <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
trans-unit.target: Classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DataTableMapping" /> inviata attraverso un metodo <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleRowUpdatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> executed when <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la classe <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> eseguita quando viene chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> executed when <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand" /> eseguito quando viene chiamato il metodo <see cref="M:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update(System.Data.DataSet)" />.
